1242 
 
PROGRAMMES/COURSES AVAILABLE AT THE NIGERIA CERTIFICATE IN EDUCATION (NCE) LEVEL AND THE REQUIREMENTS FOR EACH 
COURSE  
COLLEGE/COURSE  COURSE REQUIREMENTS  UTME SUBJECTS  
    
IGBO L2/MATHEMATICS  
  
FC-PANK  
  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics and any three (3) Arts/Science 
subjects.  
  
Mathematics and any one (1) Science and one (1)  
Arts subject.  
  
MUSIC / IGBO L2  
AROCHUKWU  
FC-ABEO  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics and any three (3) Arts subjects.  
  
Any three (3) Arts subjects.  
  
IGBO / INTEGRATED SCIENCE  
ONITCOE  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Igbo, one (1) Science and one (1)  
Arts subject.  
  
Igbo, one (1) Science and one (1)  Arts subject.  
  
IGBO/ 
 ADEYEMI    
ASSCOED   
 FC-PANK    
 ILA             
OTTO/IJANIKIN  
  
ISLAMIC STUDIES  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Islamic Studies, Igbo and any Arts 
subject.   
  
Igbo, Islamic Studies and any other Arts subject.  
  
 AGBOR        
 ALVAN       
FC-AMUFU          
FC-OKENE          
FC-PANK          
IKERE   
OTTO/IJANIKIN  
  
IGBO/MUSIC  
  
  
  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Igbo and any two (2) Arts subjects.   
  
Igbo and any other two (2) Arts subjects.
